resources.string: Find your Digimon using the DigiDex

"{name}" is a freshly hatched baby digimon. Ranges from being incapable of initiating attacks on its own to being able launching of weak attacks while sporting minimal to no defence. It is pretty cute though.

"{name}" is a young digimon recently digivolved. It is slightly bigger and possesses a more complex form that generally still has undefined body parts. Capable of weak attacks while sporting minimal defence
"{name}" is a rookie digimon. An adolescent digimon, it\'s capable on holding its own against a good number of opponents on its own. Capable of moderate attacks while sporting moderate defence.
"{name}" is a champion digimon. A powerful digimon digivolved from its rookie form, capable of strong attacks while sporting a pretty decent defence.
"{name}" is an armor digimon. Digivolved from special means, it is a pretty powerful digimon capable of considerably damaging attacks and a sturdy defence.
"{name}" is an ultimate digimon. It has attained one of the most powerful forms of digivolution. It sports an incredible array of attacks while sports incredible defenses.
"{name}" is a mega digimon. It\'s a God-Tier level digimon capable of leveling the battlefield with little to no effort. It sports of extremely powerful attacks with a near impenetrable defence.
